data_table.description: Year 1. Annual follow-up observations among participants of the Jackson Heart Study including adult 35-84 years old African Americans.

variable.name: Individual_ID
variable.description: Subject Identifier

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF1V1
variable.description: 1. First, have you had a serious illness or injury that started or got worse in the last year?

variable.name: AF1V8
variable.description: 8. Have you moved to a worse residence or neighborhood?

variable.name: AF1V9
variable.description: 9. Have you or anyone in your household lost a job?

variable.name: AF1V10
variable.description: 10. Have you retired from a job when you did not want to?

variable.name: AF1V11
variable.description: 11. Have you had a divorce or separation from your (husband/wife)?

variable.name: AF1V12
variable.description: 12. Were you raised up to age 16 by anyone other than your natural parents?

variable.name: AF1V13A
variable.description: 13a. Was that because one of your parents died, divorced or separated, or from some other reason?

variable.name: AF1V13B
variable.description: 13b. Specify

variable.name: AF1V14A
variable.description: 14a. Did your father (or other important male caretaker) ever work for pay while you were growing up?
variable.value: There was no father/male caretaker in household

variable.name: AF1V14B
variable.description: 14b. When you were growing up, what was your father's (or other important male caretaker's) main job ?

variable.name: AF1V14C
variable.description: 14c. What were his most important activities or duties?

variable.name: AF1V14D
variable.description: 14d. What kind of business or industry was that?

variable.name: AF1V15A
variable.description: 15a. What is the highest degree or years of school your father (or important male caretaker) completed?
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.
variable.value: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF1V15B
variable.description: 15b. Did he complete a GED?

variable.name: AF1V16A
variable.description: 16a. Did your mother (or other important female caretaker) ever work for pay while you were growing up?
variable.value: There was no mother/female caretaker in household

variable.name: AF1V16B
variable.description: 16b. What was her main occupation or job while you were growing up?

variable.name: AF1V16C
variable.description: 16c. What were her most important activities or duties?

variable.name: AF1V16D
variable.description: 16d. What kind of business or industry was that?

variable.name: AF1V17A
variable.description: 17a. What is the highest degree or years of school your mother completed?

variable.name: AF1V17B
variable.description: 17b. Did she complete a GED?

variable.name: AF1V18
variable.description: 18. When you were growing up, did your parents own or were buying their home, pay rent?
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF1V19A
variable.description: 19a. Have indoor plumbing?

variable.name: AF1V19B
variable.description: 19b. Have electricity?

variable.name: AF1V19C
variable.description: 19c. How many rooms did it have?
variable.value: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF1V20A
variable.description: 20a. A refrigerator?

variable.name: AF1V20B
variable.description: 20b. A car?

variable.name: AF1V20C
variable.description: 20c. A telephone?

variable.name: AF1V20D
variable.description: 20d. A television?

variable.name: AF1V20E
variable.description: 20e. Air conditioning?

variable.name: AF1V21
variable.description: 21. That is all the questions I have. Do you have any other comments or questions?

variable.name: AF1Vflag
variable.description: Data record present: Yes/No
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form version
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.
